name: Their Hungry, Thirsty Roots
description:
Why should a brand new settlement on dwarf planet Ceres have mysterious noises in the night?

Use arrow keys to move (or try to..) and walk into things & people to interact with them.

Made with the Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux  (https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy); Image to Bitsy by ruin (https://ruin.itch.io/image-to-bitsy) was also used. The cover image contains a detail from the cover illustration to Christina Rossetti's Goblin Market, by Dante Gabriel Rossetti., and a NASA JPL images of Ceres taken by the Dawn spacecraft. Music by me.

Done for the Goblins Bitsy Jam (https://itch.io/jam/goblins-bitsy) October/November 2020. The story will hopefully continue beyond this initial episode, which is all that I scoped to finish for the jam.
